Repository Name Unauthorized: Castillo de San Marcos and Fort Matanzas
Notes: Materials relating to the construction, architecture and operation of the Castillo and Fort Matanzas found in Spanish and British archives. Documents early colonial and territorial history of Florida including military life, Battles & Sieges, Arms & Armaments,the history and cultural influences of Native Americans, Spanish, English,Colonial African Americans, Minorcans and United States.
